department: Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
short_summary: The CORE eCRM Project is focused on developing and implementing an electronic case management system (eCRM) and portal with online complaint form to support the CORE's operations and attainment of its business goals
description: See the attached document for the full tender description.
duration_in_months: This contract will last for 1 year, with a 1 year option period
